Asura expands his large Truth-Seeking Balls further and sends them out to the opponent, where they converge and explode.

== Trivia ==
* While unnamed in ''[[Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Blazing]]'', it was named in ''[[Naruto x Boruto: Ninja Voltage]]''.
* In ''Ultimate Ninja Blazing'', the center Big Truth-Seeking Ball grows as the others remain the same size, while in ''Ninja Voltage'', all the balls grow larger.
